name: JOhn
reviews: It’s a stop gap way to get a loan. Liam was easy enough to get. But several issues I didn’t like…1) this loan doesn’t go on my credit rating. I paid all my bills off, on time.. but it’s never going to report as a good loan. 2) dont do auto withdrawal! They would try sometimes withdrawal a day ahead  of due date when my paycheck has not deposited yet. BOUNCE!!35$ bank fee. Several times Then it’s noted on spotloan record as  late payment.

name: Ron
reviews: They helped me when others would'nt. They took a chance with me and my credit wasn't the greatest, but they helped right when I really needed it the most. I'm on my second loan, and I greatly appreciate them giving me a chance where others wouldn't. Thank you,  SPOT LOAN IS.          SPOT ON!!!

name: John D.
reviews: Ridiculously high percentages, makes no sense. How is someone going to borrow $800? And then payback upwards of $3500+. Little to 0 customer service, no one to speak to, terrible website, etc. Better off without it.

name: customer
reviews: Dont know why I tried again with this company! The first loan you get is 490% interest after that it drops down to 460% and it has been said that after 10 loans it will go down to 99% ( I have yet to see that!) I called today to make my payment and asked them about a payoff and was misquoted. When I tried to tell them that they kept saying it was because I didn't make my payment that was due TODAY! I did the math and they are over charging and I tried to explain that and to tell them I wanted to pay off the loan in full so there should be a payment due today but they said the payment due hit the account THIS MORNING. I turned off autopay because they were constantly taking the payment BEFORE the agreed upon due date and over drafting my account.

name: Janna
reviews: By far this was the worst experience I have ever had. The loan was late. When I got it I had forgotten that I applied. Your customer service is rude. I would rather deal with the situation then to use you all again. Goodbye

name: TINA GALLION
reviews: I can get this email and can't even get the approval paperwork to sign 😒  I have been a repeat borrower for ever!!! And your IT department isn't any help!!!

name: customer
reviews: Rachel P, is the worst person that could ever work @ any job site!!!!!!! She said I wasn’t entitled to a refund the account should have closed in June even if I missed a payment or so it would not add up to October & had I not said anything they would have still been taking money out of my account.  Had the audacity to say I signed agreement I didn’t agree for you to rob me !!!

name: tbolt555
reviews: The reason I gave you a 5-star rating is because of the great service that I receive from all the great people that work there.Keep going the way you are going why mess with perfection?

name: charles Mckinnon
reviews: Spotloan helped me when I needed a loan back in March for $800.  I paid $149.00 every other week until September.  I may have missed one payment or so but I paid at least $1200 to receive a payoff amount $80 more than original amount I borrowed.  I understand these are high interest loans but this is plain usury.

They are worst than speedy cash or check into cash. Will never open another account

reviews: Loan wasn't used and sent back to company a few days after realizing one was taken. But 1 month later I still got monthly charges taken from my account.  First agent I spoke to said to send her an email detailing the charges on my cars. I did.She said money would ve refunded in a day. 2nd agent said first agent misinformed me and it will be in a week.It's 2 weeks later. I was never send an email first of all saying I had returned the payment until September 29!! September 29 lmao. I spoke with an agen today 10/06/22 and he said he saw where everything was noted on what I spoke about and he connected me to a supervisor. Who was saying an email was sent to me about the picture I ahd sent wasn't able to be use.. PS. I never got an email from them about this. Or I would have sent an update proof from my bank statement. Supervisor said I would have to just keep calling to check the process.??????Ok. Incompetent teams. Just have the money returned since you already have proof I don't bave a loan but you are taking money from my account. I don't want to keep calling because then I don't want to be rude to your agents. Just get this fixed.  Uughhh

reviews: I called every day for over a week because i put a hold on my acct and wanted to pay my loan off in full with another debit card and was told that i wouldn't be penalized because i was in contact with you and you knew i was trying to pay it off. Well in the end i ended up with my credit dropping 48 points because it was being said that i had closed my account which wasn't true. I spoke to a new person every day and they all said the same thing that it was in the notes that i was trying to pay off my account, except on the 6th day the person i spoke to said i was going to have to pay more and that he didn't know if my account had tried charging my bank. Well you did a few times and i was penalized for a stop on my account a couple of times so that was why my credit dropped so much. So thank you for messing up my credit which I have been trying to fix for quite sometime.

Over time you will be able to get loans with better rates. So just make sure you have a plan or be able to pay the minimum amount each month and you will be fine. Their custoimer service is amazing.

reviews: Although there was a high interest rate, they got me the money on time and no gimmicks. At the end of the day, they did their job and everything was on the up and up. So very satisfied with the experience.

name: customer
reviews: My most recent loan totaled $800 and when initiated it I selected, and was under the understanding that my loan was taken with an obligation of 3 equal payments for the next 3 months, as was my elected payment terms with multiple other spotloan loans I’d taken and successfully paid off.  Unbeknownst to me, spotloan placed me in an outrageously high interest loan payment plan that spanned over nearly 1 year time to pay off and monthly payments that averaged $325.  When I discovered after making my first payment I called them to discuss the discrepancy due to me not entering into that longterm agreement and I asked them to recalculate my loan based on the 3 monthly payments I agreed to, which was evident in my loan history for several years. Instead of considering proof and reason, they refused.  Not only did they refuse, their “manager” sent me an email that basically told me I was **** out of luck.  Appalled and scammed, I was able to eventually pay the loan off with thousands of dollars of interest stolen from me due to an internal clerical error on their part.

reviews: Through a lending agency I applied for a loan after recently paying off a couple of loans. Several companies contacted me with an offer and a meeting. After selecting a loaner and waiting for a reply, I received a loan offer and application from Spot Loan. It was an easy decision to select Spot Loan, since I had recently paid off a prior loan with them. Based on the quick service, favorable terms and deliverly promise of a deposit to my checking account within the advertised time limit, I was eager to complete the loan application and submit it within the requested time period. Final processing of the loan and the corresponding deposit to my checking acount occurred successfully within the time period promised. It's always comforting to know you can expect and receive prompt and quality repeat service from a company.

But I should have thought it through now. It took forever to get it paid off. I did pay it off early, but I paid more than double what I originally borrowed and that was in only 4 months. Do NOT go this route unless you think it through completely and know what you are truly signing up for.

name: Jerry
reviews: They are still charging illegal interest rates. My wife is paying $1900 on a $500 loan. They are charging a whopping 490% ,interest. This is illegal and we aren't going to stand for it.They get away with this immoral and egregious lending because they are on tribal lands and therefore not subject to federal and state laws.The maximum annual interest rate a lender can legally charge annually is 36%. NOT 490%Not to mention the fact that they aren't even licensed. This is why they do not have to be paid back. This is why we are having our bank stop payment to them and the other lenders that charge illegal interest rates. It's stealing.We weren’t even showed how much we would be paying for 2 of the loans. These lenders are like the mafia. I'd bet money that most of the positive reviews on here are by people that they pay to make profiles and leave reviews.

I suggest never using them better options exist Dave Money lion solo funds true bill and many more will all give you instant money same day with just a membership fee and other benefits . name: Irma Morgan
reviews: Hi— I actually really appreciate this loan. Despite my low credit, I was accepted and was able to handle an emergency with the funds. Customer service was stellar. I only gave 3 stars because of the high interest rate. Though I understood and agreed to it, having to agree to extremely high rates while being backed into a wall by a desperate situation wasn’t a good feeling. Again, SpotLoan warns you of this and discloses it multiple times so it wasn’t a surprise. However, having bad credit and no one with decent interest rates accepting you, it puts people in already tough financial situations in a pinch.Lastly, the loan amounts given at the high interest rates aren’t the best either. (SpotLoan does disclose that after paying off a loan, you’re subject to a higher amount.) I’m sure there’s a valid reason to their methods. But, if I have to pay back a loan, at a high interest rate, that was less than half of what I needed, getting the amount I requested would’ve made the payments worthwhile.

reviews: Do not get a loan from this company!!!  I got one and even though I agreed to pay back TRIPLE the amount, and I never ever was late or missed a payment, they screwed me!! NEVER EVER MISSED A PAYMENT OR WAS LATE, they emailed back NO!  And took the little bit of money we had and they got there $168 payment.   I was also 3 payments shy of being fully paid off.  We ended up with a negative balance in the bank account.  All so they could get there measly payment.  I would rather live on the street, eat cow manure, and lose my job then to get another loan from this company!  DONT GET A LOAN THROUGH SPOTLOAN!!!

name: Jeffrey Quigley
reviews: Better off finding a loan shark to borrow from. Yes i get that the information about the rates are posted. But it preys on the desperation of people needing assistance with urgent cash. You could be very profitable and successful without these “organ procuring” interest rates!! Then I check my account and the balance owed was $106 but i debited for my regular scheduled payment amount of $116. Yes it’s only $10 but with the amount of interest o have paid on this loan, how dare you take one extra cent! I blame myself though, for poor financial planning, lack of budgeting, and unnecessary spending, to get in a position where I would have to apply for a loan with such deplorable, bloodsucking interest rates. But when you know better, you do better. I will and so should you.😢

name: customer
reviews: The interest rate is outrageous.  My loan doubled in a month. Borrowed $800 paid it off approximately 30 to 45 days. Payoff amount was $1653. Never again

You helped me so much. Thank you. But when i went a head and paid it off all the way. I asked when could I reapply for another loan? And one said by Thursdays. One said Monday. Went to do it and you have to wait 45 days. That would of been nice for them to tell you the truth. But now I know. But I would tell all about spot loan. Good people.

name: Sha
reviews: I've had multiple loans with Spotloan with no problem.  However with this last loan I ended up in the hospital and off work for 6 weeks. As a result I was late on ONE payment. This has cost me approx. $1000 in extra interest and an extra 3 months of payments (2 payments a months so 6 extra payment). Can't blame anyone but myself. But I would suggest if you make a loan don't get sick or have an emergency before the loan is paid off.  All you get told is " it will be advantageous to pay your loan off early"! If I could do that I wouldn't need to borrow. We live and we learn

name: Cat
reviews: The loan process is fast and easy, as with any loan do not borrow unless you can afford to repay and or always pick the largest re payment amount you can afford. The two days to make a payment is annoying ( other companies allow immediate payments through debit card)  but this one probably has the lowest payment terms ( but still has the high APR of a pay day loan). I would like to see them offer low interest instalment agreements to customers who showed they consistently pay off their loans.. the $800.00 amount is good but I often find it's not really what I want if they offered about 5 thousand it would be nice and my primary go to in an emergency. So I only borrow when I need it.. I tend to use this to pay something off early for no interest, then at the end of the week ( of a pay day) pay off the loan before interest kicks in.. or at least make a 400 payment to keep the interest down. So far I've probably used this site at least 7 times for various amounts..  I would recommend most people borrow an amount you could pay off at once if you need to.. ( be within a paycheck range).

name: customer
reviews: May I get a negative stars option, please?Hello, let me state right off the bat that I have my own culpability for not taking the time to read things. Emergency and panic are no excuse. That said, when i applied, I was upfront about living in a fixed income where I am paid 1x/month.I got hit with a payment about 15 days later, about the 15th of November, about 2 weeks sooner than I'd imagined; based upon the information I provided to begin with. I had to scramble and in my panic, noticed I got an email saying my payment schedule had changed. Again, I was in the middle of something and told myself I'd read it later and forgot. Thank you, Fibromyalgia Brain. Well, then, again based on the information that I'm paid on the 3rd of the month, I'm sure you can imagine my shock to find out if incurred overages again because they processed the payment for the 1st. Then, again on the 15th!Ok, I see a pattern here; 1st and 15th. NOPE!Preparing items to take to a potluck in 2 days for NYE and I get an alert that I was be overstating when the bank settled its transactions at the end of the day. In sure you can imagine the shock in my head when I saw that Spotloan was processing a 3rd payment in the month of December!! December 29th, to be exact!I was extremely upset and distraught. I'd taken the $300 loan to avoid overdraft charges so I could pay for something I desperately needed. Not only was I paying $889.21 in interest for a $300 loan; 490% APR; but, they weren't willing to work within the parameters of my income, as laid out in the beginning. Plus, I'd called after the payment on the 15th. I was told my request to have a single monthly payment to be taken out of my account on the 3rd was possible. However, It would mean restructuring my payment schedule and so my monthly total would raise And, because on their end it was still processing even though my bank showed it as a successful transaction, I'd have to try calling in a few days because their system had to show it successful before they could do anything and, No, they could not put a note in the system or make changes to happen automatically.  Then came the Coup de Grace, on the 29th, their website showed that a payment of $56.63 would be processed that day and my remaining/payoff balance for that day was $282.16.Having worked in escrow and loans,  I read that to mean if I paid the loan in full on that day, my Total would be $282.16.I got lucky and had a relative offer me the money  to cover the payoff amount. I called to make said payoff and was told that the $282.16 was the payoff amount, IF the $56.63 payment showing "would be taken out that day" successfully cleared. To actually payoff the entire loan that day, I needed to pay $56.63 AND $282.16.WOW! 5 payments in and I'm, finally, paying the amount of the initial loan. If I recall correctly, I saw that of each payment, only $3.00 and change went to pay the principal of my loan. Thankfully, my relative understood and gave me extra to pay it off and then some.Never again!

One would think that they would be taxed a couple hundred dollars more, not thousands... But, when I asked could they lower my payback amount? I was told No. I will never, and I mean NEVER, reach out to this company ever again for a loan.I have borrowed from others b4. And when I lost my income, they worked with me. name: Melissa
reviews: With the exception of deferring 1 payment, I have made all payments on time. My contract states that if a payment is deferred then I will be sent a new payment schedule adjusting the payments. To date I have yet to receive this new payment schedule. One deferred payment has somehow mysteriously turned into 7 new payments. My first payment was scheduled January 29, 2021. It was deferred. My last original payment was scheduled for November 5, 2021. Here it is December 1, 2021 and I am being told my last payment will not be until February 11, 2022. That’s 7 extra payments somehow added in there. I guess it’s acceptable for this company to breach contract by not sending me the updated payment schedule as stated in the signed contract. When speaking with the customer service agent she was unable to answer where this company was headquartered and told me “Belcourt, Utah” then put me on a hold, came back and said “Belcourt, North Dakota”. She could not explain the 7 extra payments. She could not explain why I was never sent an updated schedule. She couldn’t explain why she chose to laugh at me when I was asking questions.  I would love an explanation on the breach of contract on Spotloan’s part.

name: customer
reviews: I like Spotloan for its convenience, great customer service and consistent loan agreement. When I am in need of extra few hundred dollars, I may rest assured that Spotloan will assist me. All I have to do is make payments on time or just pay it all off.If I were to personally borrow money, it comes with commitment. If I were to get an advance from work, I owe my company my reasons for borrowing as well as my loyalty and dedication to work in addition to the obligation of reimbursement. But Spotloan is a great and the only entity that asks me to simply pay back. They are impersonal and all about business. I highly recommend Spotloan if you want the freedom to pay off and go on with your daily life without continuing to feel obligated. Thank you Spotloan for your existence.

name: Jean Miles
reviews: I was happy with getting my first loan. It was fast and helped my situation at the time. I applied again,  not knowing I had one payment left, NOT overdo. I called and talked to a very nice representative to ask what my payoff was and how soon I could get another loan once it was paid. She told me the amount and said I could get another loan right away, as soon as I paid it off. I paid the balance, early, and applied again. I received a message saying I could not receive another loan because I had received a denial in the last 45 days. I immediately called customer support and explained what had happened.  He tod me he took notes and support would call me back to fix the problem. I received several emails thanking me for my business and saying I was now a preferred customer and eligible for up to $800. I applied again and received the same email, saying I was not eligible. I called customer service and received the same response. I do believe support called me but we are on different time zones so I asked them to set up a specific time they would call so I would not miss it again. No response. I continued receiving emails saying I was eligible for another loan but it did not follow through. I would still like to take out another loan and would be happy to change this rating once this issue has been resolved. Also, to note, I paid my previous loan on time and was not late on payments.

Spotloan gave me what i needed and I made sure the payments were made.   I would give them 5 stars but the interest on the amount you borrow is insanely high.   I knew that coming into it, but it still helped me when I needed it.   If people are looking to build credit with this, then look elsewhere.  Spotloan DOES NOT report to credit agencies about your payments.   It really is a fast an easy way to get approved and the money really does go into your account quickly.  But again, be aware of the interest rate

name: DEIRDRE TARVER
reviews: Simple process, next day deposit, up to 800, no prepayment penalty, would strongly recommend you pay back as fast as possible to avoid interest. With that said you have plenty of options on the rate which you pay back. Obviously the lower the payment the more interest paid over time. But in an emergency this place comes through in the clutch. I have had about 4 loans from spot loan over the last couple of years for various expenses with no negative experiences. As stated before make sure you can afford your payments and or make sure you pay it back as soon as possible. It is an additional cost over time as with any loan.

name: Craig Kupchik
reviews: I didn’t even want the loan to begin with I was recommended over by another loan company and I wanted to just see what my payments would be and I told him I no longer needed it. The next day they called to confirm that I canceled my application, next thing you know they sent over the money anyway leaving me with this insane loan that I didn’t even want. I only called to get a quote and see how much I would qualify for and I ended up stuck with this. Then I had a change of events in my life where I lost my job a few months later and I tried to explain to them that I had a different pay schedule which was from weekly to biweekly. I called multiple times as well as emailed to try to communicate that my payments would be a little wacky because I couldn’t afford it for the month I was out of work. Next thing you know they’re threatening me that they’re going to close my account and send it into a collective party. When I clearly expressed my concerns and my side of the story multiple times through multiple emails, also when I would try to make payments to catch up the customer service representatives are always completely out of line demanding that I make payments which I understand but they didn’t understand that I wanted to make a payment of the amount I could afford and then the following week pay another amount to catch up which they would not allow so I had to wait to make payment which cost me to be late it’s just a mess and I truly believe that in order for customers to be able to feel like they can trust a company they need to understand circumstances can change in a matter of seconds and customer service representatives don’t really have a right to belittle someone for Trying to make the minimal effort to keep up with things instead of getting for closing sent to a collective service. All I can say is we settled in agreement finally after 67 months of having the loan I believe I am now free from this company and I don’t have to worry about it anymore but I don’t recommend this for anyone who is literally trying to just build credit because that was the whole purpose of mine and then it turned out I really depended on it to survive..

name: James Day
reviews: The loan was a loan my mom took out The only thing good about your service if you guys were fast because she was in a pinch and need the money but there was no proper explanation of how fees will be taking out I could’ve went to New York and got a loan shark to give her a better interest-rate I understand that you guys take a high-risk I get that I’m in the financial industry but when I finance a car is the most I can finance it for is 30% and that rarely happens and the people have to have awful credit my mom didn’t have that bad of credit she thought she did but she didn’t so she rushed into getting one of your loans Not that you won’t have a mound of them but I am going to file a report with the Better Business Bureau And with the Missouri attorney generals office It is so egregious that people like you exist $10 an hour  employees loaning people money Who have no other option like I said I understand charge you some additional interest For the risk of the customers that you take on but you really don’t have a lot of risk you tie it to the bank account and most people don’t switch bank accounts so you’ve got them Held prisoner are you guys quadruple even more than that the reason warm as interest even if you charge 30% what is the max I’ve ever seen on a Automobile loan on someone with awful credit that has a credit score of the 400s my mom was a 672 Of her highest Credit bureau I know this because I just leased her a new Jeep Grand Cherokee Her score merited a tier  one. I really enjoyed the canned bs response you can say whatever you want you may send over terns and conditions,but in no way did you throughly explain the process it was quick quick so you couid get her to sign, let me ask you this when you an employee from your company called my mom, and did a welcome call or customer interview prior to her signing the contract, how much time did your associate spend going over the terms and conditions? Oh wait I don’t think anyone ever called did they? And you said you’re sorry to see you got a one star review it’s only because I couldn’t give you a negative your pond scum we’re all company I’ve already follow complaint with the attorney generals office of Missouri and I would like to find out where your corporate offices are, So I can file a complaint with the attorney general in your state  and Better Business Bureau, you take complete advantage of people in need you guys are not a business it’s legal extortion and hopefully more people will keep bringing to the proper authorities and they will bring this type of trash industry to a hault. Also the loan is paid in full what will calling do for my mom so you can tell her that you explained things too her and you are in the clear, if you were indeed a decent reputable company maybe you would suggest a remedy maybe refund her some the money that was seriously overcharged, I’m also reviewing you on several other places such as Ripp off report which reaches far more people then trust pilot.

reviews: Overall, my experience was a positive one. There were times wen I was unable to make the biweekly pymt. Wen I saw tht approaching, I tried to take the lead & inform them in advance. On at least one occasion, I knew the funds were not going to cover tht particular payment. After calling & explaining why, I do'nt recall one instance whereby I was treated disrespectful. I explained the situation as best I could & frm tht, a  new payment was reestablished. Nobody ever thinks they will need to utilize the services of a payday loan; however, never say never, because u simply do'nt know. I was going through chemo for colon cancer at the time, & they were there wen I needed them. Thank you.

reviews: The loan process was easy.  I knew a high interest rate loan is not a thing you should do. But with no one to help me get through the month and needing to take care of my grandchildren's needs who had lost their mom, I wanted to make sure they didn't go without food and shelter.  I had a plan to pay the loan within 1 month. It took 6 weeks but I did it. That is the key to success of this type of loan.  I would say never say never. Just have a plan and hard as it may seem, stick to it. This is a loan for desperate times only and with a plan to pay back quickly.  Customer service was very pleasant.

The last call was a Voicemail from Spot Loan to me, asking if my money was in my account, asking me to call them and let them know. I had to do this twice. Everyone there has a heart of gold and truly cares.  They did everything to help me get my loan paid off. Even with the problems I had I received an email saying I was automatically approved and with a lower interest rate as a returning customer. These people are the cream of the crop and the most important is that want you to come back. Everybody person wished me well thru my Covid and truly cared. reviews: I wouldn’t recommend this company for a loan. The APR is extremely high and I’m pretty sure illegal. I also didn’t care for their customer service. We are in 2021 this is just ridiculous and unheard of honestly. Don’t waste your time because you’ll be paying triple back for just $800. A huge rip off and scamming people who are already struggling! I don’t know how they have gotten good reviews unless they’re paid or sponsored because any average person wouldn’t use them on the regular as interest is 490% which is insanely high and just flat out wrong! Out of curiosity, I wanted to know after I paid my last loan off in full how much lower the APR would be and it went from 490 to 460%! Big drop, not!! Beware!!!

name: Rebecka Howry
reviews: I was approved for a small loan on a Thursday but never received it on Friday or Saturday while Spotloan did.not respond to 2 emails seeking reasons ?      This was followed by my Spotloan account stating more than half the loan would be added as interest and a processing fee. At no time did Spotloan give me fair notice that they could not transfer my loan into my direct deposit Comerica Bank SSI mastercard account which i just independantly learned only accepts cash transfers from federal government. What this amounts to is misleading me into agreeing to make 3 monthly payments from my cash debitcard account for an amount more than 50 % above the amount of my loan which Spotloan never deposited into the same bank account. SPOTLOAN HAS A DUTY TO ADD FAIR NOTICE ON WEBSITE THAT IT DOES NOT SEND LOANS INTO COMERICA BANK MASTERCARD ACCOUNTS and should have given me such advance notice before having me wait five days for approved loan it was not sending me.

reviews: I applied for soooo many loans and this was the only one that accepted me. The money was in my account really quickly and right when i needed it, thankfully! the interest rate was pretty mf high but that’s all loans i guess. it was split up in bi-weekly payments which i appreciated way more than if they would have been every single week. i got a loan for 600 dollars and i pretty much paid back double the amount but hey that’s the name of the game with loans unfortunately lol. but yeah it was like $231 biweekly payments for a few months which was doable. also an option to pay one hundred something but it would have taken longer to pay off & would have cost more in the long run, for convenience i guess. i paid it all off tho with no problems yayyy!! it was my first loan and i love that i’m pre-approved for the next time. thanks spotloan!!

name: Jeremiah Davis
reviews: This is the worst place to get a Loan from they are loan sharks of the worst kind 1st of all they don't give you a much but its at a very high interest rate  It's only been 3 weeks since I borrowed $750 from this company and I was ready to go ahead and pay it off because I have the money together now that I've gotten paid so I called yesterday June 30th 2021 and asked them what my pay off amount would be I was told that as long as my previous automatic withdrawal had gone through it would only be $800 well only $800 so I agreed to wait to make sure that that Had gone through even though I know for a fact from looking at my bank account that the 158 had already been pulled out last week  I was told that it would be 800 no more but after receiving an email confirming that I wanted to pay my account off in the email it tells me that I will be paying $890 so I call to find out why the price differences where do that extra $90 come in and they said that they were gonna review the call when I told them that I had already called and been told 800 So they leave me on the phone waiting and 5 minutes passes they come back on the phone and they say we reviewed the phone call and he did tell you 890 I know for a fact it was a lie I wrote down the amount I'm not crazy but they will stand by their 890 when I ask to listen to the phone call as well OK then let me hear it maybe I misunderstood they said no they flat out refuse to let me hear it they are crooks their liars and I will never ever do business with them again and I will always regret doing business with them to begin with and I will warn you That unless you want to be robbed do not do business with this company Try advanced America they're high but they're honest

name: Teresa Johnson
reviews: I've done business with SPOTLOAN for more than a few years now.This time around I was very happy to see that monthly payment had gone down from $118 to $114...I made an innocent mistake on the payment due date. The question was when was my next check.. I answered HONESTLY that it is July 2nd since the 3rd falls on a SATURDAY.. Payment schedule generated the 2nd as due date for entire loan.. Called immediately to fix but was told I had to ACCEPT the loan first to then fix it.BOTTOM LINE to do that my happiness faded since it's no longer $114 it's now $117 something... In this case Honesty WAS NOT the best policy..Thank you for taking the time to read this.

reviews: If you have bad credit and get into a situation where u need money and need it quickly, Spotloan is definitely the place to go. While process is very easy and quick, including receiving the funds. It just seems like it should be damn near illegal to charge so much interest though. I get that they are taking a big risk lending to people with bad/no credit but 490%???? Doesn't even look anywhere near ok even just looking at that number. I paid about $1400 just to borrow $800...that's nuts!! But, when you NEED the money, you gotta do what you gotta do. I am grateful I found somewhere that would even lend me the money, just wish it wasn't so expensive in the long run.

reviews: Spot loan has been useful to me for a few years and helped me pay some bills

name: Ebony Mondy
reviews: They really do deliver the money by the end of the day. I have gone through them many times. However, I am putting 4 stars because of how much you end up having to pay back by the end of it. I usually try to pay it off within 2 payments so I don't have to pay as much back. But this time I'm not going to be able to. I just got a $600 loan and by the time I am done paying for it, I'm going to be paying back $2,340.79. That is INSANE for a $600 loan. So I wouldn't recommend doing it unless you absolutely need the money. Another one I go through is NetCredit. You can get up to $10000. I got $3300 right before Christmas last year. You end up having to pay back more to that as well. But nothing like SpotLoan.

reviews: Helpful to get a loan of this size ~ not too little and not too big.  Biggest drawback is the limited structure for making additional payments. reviews: I just wanted to post my second review I have used spot loan now twice and paid both loans off, in this time they have been great for me. As things for me begin to calm down I hope to not to need them again but if I do I know Spot Loan is here. I cannot speak for everyone but again for the second time my experience has been fine and even when there was an issue I called for clarity and felt like they were transparent in our communication, if I needed them again I would not hesitate. name: Edwin Hernandez
reviews: I'll preface this by saying this is a very expensive loan.  However, when you need a small dollar loan fast and other lenders reject you, Spotloan is who you need to go to.  There are no restrictions for making extra payments and/or paying the loan off early.  My recommendation would be to do so!I have been very pleased with my experiences.  The application is very easy, and the timeframes for the loan to post to your account are accurate.  Usually, it is 1-2 business days, but with the last loan, I applied early in the morning and received it later in the afternoon.  I was thrilled, as I was in a tight spot until the money came in.  The service team with Spotloan is great too.  Either by phone or email, they are very friendly and respond quickly to questions and requests.  Again, if you have poor credit and need a short-term small dollar amount loan, I highly recommend Spotloan.  They do reduce rates a bit for repeat customers with good payment history, which is nice.  It's still an expensive loan, but slightly less so.

I would highly recommend Spotloan to anyone. They're my go-to in times of need.

name: Patricia
reviews: Simply wonderfully customer service that must be recognized and rewarded. I loathe your company nearly as much as despise my own pathetic existence and I will buy a donkey and hit the road doing shows if you are still reading this. I will say, no, it would be wasted and I need to save my best material for my suicide and note. name: customer
reviews: I applied & was approved for a loan with Spotloan for $800. The documentation was signed & executed on 01/06/2021 at 4:36pm. According to Spotloan's procedures they should've disbursed the $800 to my bank account on 01/07/2021. As of today, 01/14/2021, the $800 is still not in my bank account I have sent several emails to Spotloan informing them that the $800 had not been credited to my bank account.  I would get a response from SPOTLOAN telling me their procedures for disbursing funds and what my payment schedule was & payment amount. Finally I received an email asking me to call them; which I did.. About 2 days ago when I called Spotloan & spoke to one of their agents/representatives, I believe his name was Pablo, regarding this problem we discovered that SOMEONE AT SPOTLOAN had added another number to my account number at my bank. MY banking information that I provided on my application to Spotloan WAS CORRECT; but was INPUT WRONG BY SPOTLOAN. Therefore the funds did not go to my account. I was informed that I would have to wait at least 7 business days before the funds could be sent to my account because they had to trace the funds & retrieve the funds. WHY IS THIS MY PROBLEM & WHY SHOULD I HAVE TO WAIT TO RECEIVE THE $800?? I also informed the agent/representative, Pablo, at Spotloan that my account showed a balance of the $800 plus interest that had been accruing. I SHOULD NOT HAVE A BALANCE AT ALL SINCE MY ACCOUNT HAS NOT BEEN CREDITED WITH THE $800 & THERE CERTAINLY SHOULD NOT BE ANY INTEREST ACCRUING!! I LOOKED AT MY ACCOUNT WITH SPOTLOAN TODAY, 01/14/2021, AT 4:00PM & IT IS SHOWING MY ACCOUNT BALANCE AS $880.48 ($800 FOR THE LOAN & $80.48 FOR INTEREST ACCRUING) & MY PAYMENT OF $473.70 DUE ON 02/03/2021. THIS IS ABSURD & TOTALLY UNACCEPTABLE!! I'VE NEVER SEEN OR HEARD OF ANYTHING LIKE THIS BEFORE. SUCH UNPROFESSIONAL CONDUCT IN THE MATTER OF HOW SPOTLOAN IS HANDLING THIS MATTER.

I do not recommend this company to anyone and I try to warn another that asks about payday loans to not go with this company.

name: customer
reviews: I applied for a loan with Spotloan, and was approved for funds to be in my account on Monday.  When the funds were not there, I checked email, and I had a request for more identification information.  I did send the information, but also sent an email stating that they already had the info, as I previously had a loan last year, with every payment made on time every time, and none of my information had changed.  I immediately received an email stating that my funds would be available the next morning, and they were!  Everyone was very helpful.  This is my second loan with Spotloan.

Very good if you need money asap but i would say only if you know you can replace it within 2 weeks of borrowing otherwise you will pay a ridiculous amount of interest. If need need quick cash in between pay periods and you have poor credit and you can replace it by you next pay period i recommend them. If you cant, you will pay almost 3 times what u borrowed. reviews: Well as a two-time past customer, I guess I expected a little leeway with payments. After I signed and saw the payment schedule I about fell down to the floor. Usually, I had one or two "larger" payments; then payments well below $200.00 so imagine my thoughts when I saw a re-payment schedule like the one I received. $275.00 EVERY MONTH? I get that I had requested an amount higher than usual, but this seems excessive. I came back and chose you guys b/c of the previous two loans from you. I could have chosen another, but I came back to you. I thought my payments would be around $200.00 per month; but $275.00! I don't care if I have to stretch payments out a few extra months, but I simply cannot afford this amount EVERY month. At any rate, I guess I'll know better next time and give my business elsewhere. Good day.

name: Pamela Farris
reviews: Spotloan saved me from being evicted! Friendly, helpful and fast service. IMPORTANT: Short term loans can be very expensive. Even Spotloan suggests you try to borrow money from your bank or friends and family first. If you can pay off your full balance within a few weeks, they can be very handy. But, for example, if I were to take 3 months to pay off my $500 loan, I'll pay nearly $400 in interest alone! If I can pay it off in two weeks, the interest will be less than $100. Remember this number: 460% APR = 8.85% WPR (WEEKLY Percentage Rate.)

name: Jennifer
reviews: Not happy at all. Did not receive email reminder when payment was to be taken out. As the CARES act expired, money has been very scarce, so I emailed them asking them not to debit my account as we needed food. They didn't care and took the money that same day. Imagine taking advantage of vulnerable seniors during a global pandemic. That's what this company did. They line their pockets with exorbitant fees and don't care about the people they're making this money from. I'm a repeat customer, too. There should be some consideration not oh yeah we will not remind you this month, just take and claim "you didn't contact us soon enough to stop the payment". One, that's a lie, payments can be stopped at any time and two, seems suspicious that they don't bother reminding. Oh yeah they gave me a "courtesy" of waiving interest for 60 days. Damn! This courtesy tastes almost as good as chicken! Seriously, use someone else. These people are sleaze.

reviews: 3 stars because I applied on Friday and was “approved” hoping the money would be in my account Monday because I need it and it says it will be there well it wasn’t and an hour later I get an email saying more verification is needed and they will get back to me within a week after they get the documents...? name: Frances Patterson
reviews: They are very fast with helping you get a loan.

name: Doris Purcell
reviews: I received a $500 loan with a contract to pay (6) bi-weekly payments of $140.93 which is a total of $845.58. Yes, that is a high interest rate but that is typical for payday loans. Unfortunately, I did miss the first payment and because of that I have now paid a total of $1091.90! Because of the one missed payment, the interest continued to accrue from that day even though I made all of the other payments on time plus the one that I initially missed. If I hadn't called to question my balance, they would have kept charging me every two weeks while the interest kept accruing even though I had paid my loan in full.I know this is a long review, but I do not want someone else taken advantage of during a desperate situation. Recently, I found an article from April 2020 titled "Spotloan High Interest Rates Class Action Settlement." I wish I had done more research beforehand, but the least I can do is warn others. DO NOT RECOMMEND!

name: Monica Crimmins
reviews: Spotloan should be used as a last resort. The interest rates are astronomical. The worst part is, even when I paid my loan off online, they held my payment for another week. I was told that I needed to call them directly to set up loan payoff on the same day. Why? Because it’s another way for them to screw you and collect more interest. Nowhere online did it state this information. In fact, it gave me the payoff amount to pay that day and took my payment information. I got suspicious when I didn’t receive confirmation and the money was never deducted from my bank account. Even when I attempted to speak to a supervisor I was told there was nothing that could be done. They couldn’t credit me for the interest or even take the payment when I called! I had to wait until Friday when my normal payment would be deducted. Am I shocked by any of this? Not really. Shady interest rates = shady business. Beware.

name: Neioma Wellhouse
reviews: Do NOT use this company!!! The APR is stupid. Yes it is on the website but when you are in a bind you justify it in your head. The reality is you'd be better off working with your debtor or credit servicer. Rent a car if yours is broke. It will be cheaper. Their website really sucks after you commit. It is 80's basic with no information to help you see what you've paid so far. So much for the transparency they spout off about. The balance does not go down hardly at all after payment. YES I know the APR is posted on the website. When you think you have no other choice you justify it, But there is no justification for 490% interest! REALLY WTFrick? You can find loan sharks with better rates. This is financial stupidity! You want to help? LOWER your rates and fix your website! The only way I can see that I've paid over $900 and still owe more than the 800 I borrowed is to look at my checking account. This really should be illegal. Edit They also try to get your reviews removed on really dumb grounds. Ichanged the word they complained about to stupidity. Negative 10 stars!

name: Vicente
reviews: While I agree with most of the review on here in terms of the approval process being fast and easy, I wish I had really taken the time to look at just how much in interest I would be paying over the life of this loan. The interest accrues DAILY and seems like my principal balance is not going down even though I'm making my semi-monthly payments on time. I had taken out a similar loan with a different company prior to using SpotLoan and although the interest was high it did not accrue on a daily basis like SpotLoan's. My advice would be to only borrow if you will be able to pay this loan off within 1-2 months. Otherwise it is not worth it! I will have paid double what I borrowed by my 8th payment!!!

reviews: I’ve used Spotloan a total of four different time and each time my experience was great. As long as I stay under $500 then the interest rate wasn’t too bad. I refer many of friends and coworkers to Spotloan.

name: Michelle Hall
reviews: It is very important that you understand the terms of a loan or line of credit before you sign and submit your application. Everyone who has given Spotloan less than 4 stars, claiming they are dishonest and untrustworthy have clearly never used a payday-type loan before, or completely read through their terms- or simply do not understand simple interest. They are ENTIRELY honest (more than most) and do not add a PENNY onto your balance that was not originally disclosed. I have now used them twice, and paid my first loan off in its entirety with my first scheduled payment. If you want to pay less, pay it off quickly. It's that simple. This isn't a refi on your mortgage, its a fast solution to an immediate problem and it works very well in that regard. I am very pleased with Spotloan. Thank you for the service.

name: Paul Lisa
reviews: The company was very helpful and professional

name: Tony Garrett
reviews: Spot Loan is a predatory lending business. They prey on people who need a little help until payday. I foolishly borrowed $800 in Jan 2019. It's now Nov and I owe over $1000 even though I have made payments of $325. a month. I have paid them over $2500 at this point. For every payment I made another $200 plus is added to my balance. I am writing this review as a warning and I have reported them to the BBB. They take advantage of people, are deceptive in their lending practices. This is modern day slavery as the only way to stop them seems to continue to pay their fees and intetest. The original loan has been repaid long ago.

name: Martin Yniguez
reviews: they are always ready to help and work with you to make it easy

name: Morvet Lloyd
reviews: Quick processing, good customer service...

name: Glenda
reviews: What to know:> 430% Interest> Online account only allows for changing payment amount on next scheduled payment. Cannot pay off loan early online or change the payment date.> Cannot change payment method online. Have to call Customer Service.> Only allows payments to be made from an account with a physical location, no online banks permitted. I was told those types of checking accounts are considered "Pre-Paid Credit Cards."Had to call customer service three times; to change a payment method (which became a payment date change due to the above reason) and request to pay off the balance on my loan - both times the reps interacted with me as though I was a problem. They seemed frustrated, and had pretty bad attitudes for no reason whatsoever. I've worked in customer service for almost two decades and the poor attitudes were one of the main reason I felt strongly about leaving a review.Overall, it seems as though they really want to string your loan out as long as possible and make it hard for you to control your repayments. I was certainly grateful to access the emergency funds when needed but I hope I never have to use them again. I had my loan out for about three weeks and it cost me over $150 in interest.

name: CHRISTINA ANTHONY
reviews: If you need to change your payback arrangement with this company, if your original agreement was to pay $100 /month for 4 months, they will penalize you and try to make you pay $100 / month for 9 months, or 10 months, or 11 months instead. They don't care about your circumstances AT ALL. In fact, they WANT you to miss your payment(s), so they can use the opportunity to coerce you or scare you into thinking that you have to pay some exorbitant penalty such as 7 extra months of payments, a penalty in this scenario of $700, when your loan might have been $300 to begin with, and you've already made two payments of $100 for a total of $200, and in the end, you've paid $900 back on a $300 loan, all based on utter nonsense and lies - you cannot be penalized to that extent under the law - at least not in California. But when people don't know their rights, they get people to go along with it, and so a major portion of their business is actual illegal fraud. I took a month off of work because I was raped and it was an incredibly difficult time for me to get through. When I tried to explain this to Spotloan to ask if I could skip this month's payment and just add an extra month to the loan period to make up for it, given the circumstances, I was told that just because I was raped didn't mean that I don't have to pay my bills on time (I wasn't proposing NOT paying my bills, I was proposing a way to restructure given the traumatic circumstances that led to an inability to pay, just for that month). Then, after telling me that it didn't matter that I was raped, they sent me an email in which they added on NINETEEN (19) EXTRA PAYMENTS onto a loan period that was supposed to be 8 months, for a total of 27 months of payments to this company, who didn't think that the hardship of being RAPED was worth accommodating with an alternate payment plan. I fixed it by raising hell, I got them to agree to my original proposal, but not before being further traumatized by them after an already incredibly traumatizing thing had just happened to me. So I decided that maybe it was an isolated incident and gave them a second chance. I took out a loan and it turned out that my pay day came a day later than usual so I missed my loan payment by a day, and they tried to add on 7 extra loan payments because I was ONE DAY late on my payment that month, due to a clerical error at my job. No understanding at all. They are sharks and will bite your leg off if you stick your toe in the water. I urge you: Do not trust Spotloan!

name: Core M
reviews: High interest rates are expected with a company like this, I understand that. But the scummy customer service reps, and the wait period for the deposit is enough to make me write this review. I needed the money ASAP, as I couldn’t get any work done until I got my car fixed. A total of 300 dollars. I researched several loan services, seeing who could get me the money quicker. Interest rates were not of my concern at the moment, due to the urgency of my vehicle failing to bring me to work to make money. AFTER WAITING 45 minutes on hold, I finally caved and selected the option to receive a call back. Once they called, I realized I wouldn’t get same day deposit due to not completed the forms before 5am central (the website guarantees   forms after 12pm will be same day). I asked the final question, the dealbreaker question: Will This company be able to complete the process tomorrow, which is a Saturday, so that I can receive my money as soon as possible? I knew this was rare, but when he assured me that my money would be in my account by tomorrow I finished the necessary forms. Not only was I still waiting for my deposit until Monday, I didn’t receive my deposit until 2 weeks prior to my forms being filled out. My bank continues to check for a deposit, and they’ve told me the information would say pending if it was on hold. So that means, Spotloan is probably the worst on getting you money on time. Now that 300 dollars I had to wait 2 weeks for, has turned into a $545 DEBT. If I had gotten the money on time, my paycheck would have been twice that. Needless to say, there are too many options for you regardless of your credit score. LENDUP is great! My story is one of the few that landed them in a lawsuit. Please research before getting bent over and rammed!

name: customer Bernice Strong
reviews: Returning Customer..Always paid my payment on time..Was under the impression I would be guaranteed another loan.  Applied for $300.00 said I would receive a email, never received it, didn't receive funds, so I applied again 3 days later, still nothing..Very disappointed.  I sent a message and no one has replied...

reviews: I just paid off a loan on August 30, 2019.  In the begin of September, I had a family emergency which was too close to paying my bills. When I received an email from Lynette thanking me for making my payments and she asked within the body of her email if I ever needed their help to let them know, I took a leap of faith and email her back. Within one day she sent me a response with the opportunity to apply for another loan. In a few minutes of me submitting my loan application, I was approved for the amount I need. I appreciate" I'm  not a robot" personal attention Spotloan shown me during this unfortunate situation. Human compassion was definitely felt by me. I would recommend Spotloan to anyone who is need of assistance.

It's false MISLEADING DECEPTIVE skirting the rules .people .so I'm treated by these two liars of above the law companies as the thief .no mention I'm a victim .at all. Don't do business with these two crooked companies .

name: Edward S.
reviews: Fraudulent!!! I applied to this company and at the end of the process was given a screen that said I would receive an email. After a half hour of checking both my inbox and spam to find I hadn't received any email I called the company. The customer service agent sounded as if I had woke her from a nap. She confirmed my info and told me my app was denied due to the type of bank account I entered they do not accept. I asked what type I needed for approval and she said i entered a prepaid card number and they don't take prepaid accounts or card numbers at all. After trying for a few minutes to explain that I have a checking account with a traditional bank and I entered my account and routing number as well as my bank name she continued to insist I entered a 16 prepaid card number. I explained that there are 3 lines to enter banking info 1 for account number 1 for routing number and 1 for bank name and no where in those 3 would it allow a 16 digit entry. She continued to insist the same. Finally I asked her to confirm my email as I had not received the email. She did. I asked her to forward me the info from my app so I could see what was going on. After her 2nd attempt and I still hadn't gotten an email I asked for a supervisor. Not to override my denial but to help me understand how they show a prepaid 16 digit card number when I entered an account and routing number. Also to help understand why I hadn't received the emails I requested. Super comes on the line and I go through the same things. Both kept insisting I entered a 16 digit prepaid card number not my banking info. I do not even own a prepaid card of any sort. I again asked the supervisor to send me the app info so I could confirm exactly what they were seeing. Confirmed my email and DID receive an email of the denial but nothing more. I explain to the super what I receive didn't have the info I was asking for. She proceeded to explain to me that I could call one of the 3 companies listed at the bottom of the email she had sent if I needed further help. Only issue was the email only has company contact email and phone numbers on it. At this point the super became upset that I persistent with question about the mix up on my account info and now email address and began speaking down to me. I ask that my info be forwarded to someone else and I receive a phone call about the situation.

name: Christina O'Donald
reviews: Quick, Easy to Access and make Payments

name: Susan Meyer
reviews: I will have to say that they application part was by far the easiest thing I have done. However, I understand that I got approved Friday and the funds would be available the next business day which would be Monday. Within 24 hours and it has been passed the 24 hour mark and no one can say when the funds will be available. I call the spotloans and they say funds where sent out this morning and deposit will be today. I call my bank and nothing is pending or on hold. So I guess I will not be able to take care of bills or go to a funeral to say my goodbyes. I did find it interesting that a loan place couldn’t tell me when the funds where sent to my bank but could verify my account information. If you are a loan specialist you should be able to say yes the funds where sent or no they have not been deposited.

name: Tiffany Wagner
reviews: Spotloan don't need to send their preprinted reply about website/contract APR upon acceptance. Listen we get it. You disclose all info up front. I have used Spotloan twice and they say "never say never", I hope I never have to come this way again. First with as much money as this company makes with its high interest rates , they should have a better portal setup to manage your account and review pay history,etc. My 1st loan was for $500 I was able to payoff off on 2nd scheduled date. My next loan was for 800.00 for things I needed to handle due to death in family( people seem to die when you're broke). I believe I have made several payments of $330.00, but when logging in a minute ago it shows balance way over $1,000.00. Now I have to make a phone call, be put on hold to get updates. GOTS TO GET THIS PAID OFF QUICK , FAST AND IN A HURRY. THE PRICE YOU PAY FOR NEEDING CASH NOW. Thinking about getting a loan from my 401k to pay this off. Interest rate would be cheaper. It would have taken me 10 days to get the money from 401 at the time I need it. All I can say is thank you for letting me have the loan and a friend has told me if I find myself is need again try OPPLOANS. Their rates are way more reasonable.

name: Janet Kalivas
reviews: I wish all loan places were as quick and easy as you guys. I don't know how the whole complete application before 10am and get funds the same day thing works...but I do know the funds will be there the next day regardless.Honestly if you want quick and simple, no runaround, no sending you to extra sites...choose SPOTLOAN!

name: Anthony Deloney
reviews: Spotloan is there to help us who are trying to rebuild our credit and not have to get sucked up by the cycle of payday loans. You just can not get caught up using payday loans! Their customer support is one of the best I have ever encountered!! I was in management my entire career and due to extensive medical problems I had to retire early and it has cost me my savings. Spotloan is an answer for the honest person to get their life back on the right track!! Thank you Spotlan!!

name: John Ross
reviews: I first tried Spotloan when I had my car break down suddenly and needed money right away to pay for repairs. They approved my loan immediately and the money was in my account the next day which allowed me to pay my repair bill right away. What I like about Spotloan is the service I receive from them. The funds are available the next day after you apply, they email a payment schedule to make sure the dates match up with pay dates and it also allows you to know when the funds will be taken out of your account. And the amount of the final payment is exactly what they say it is and once paid you can re-loan immediately if need be. I currently have another loan with Spotloan and because of the great customer service I receive, this is the only company I will work with when I need a loan.

name: Tina

name: Catherine Rivera
reviews: Yes, Spotloan is a Tribal lender.  Yes, that means they can legally charge a higher interest rate than a "mainstream" lender.  Know that going in.  Why do I give them 5 stars?  Easy.  They let you choose your payment size.  They give you a CLEAR payoff schedule, up front.  (Many other lenders will rake you over the coals in interest and/or "loan renewal" fees.)  If you continue to be a good customer with them they can give you a reduced rate on future loans.  I am a repeat customer, and they are one of only TWO Tribal lenders I honestly recommend.

name: Joan Slayton
reviews: While definitely not something to rely upon in everyday life to get by, as it is certainly untenable to pay this much interest ongoing. I'd call it usurous if the interest rate and how it affects your payments and overall payoff amount over time weren't so conspicuous. If you can't get credit in other avenues and have a need for 500 dollars right now with the intention of paying it back in a couple of weeks when you get paid, it's doable... just not a long term strategy.

name: Jeffrey C.
reviews: A few days ago, these guys were the only ones who would offer me any sort of short-term loan, after hours of maddening merry-go-rounding with middlemen advertisers/lender finders. It seems Republicans in my state banned payday lending, so only Native American institutions- which may ignore some state and federal laws as per Federal treaties with them (which we evidently **haven't** unilaterally abrogated just before another round of pillaging and murdering)- were able to offer anything. The one time Republicans step in to help consumers, and they screw me and others over in the process! Anyway, I was in an extreme bind because of an emergency dislocating me. I couldn't pay the motel for that day or the last- until their loan came in at the 11th minute of the 11th hour (figure of speech indicating deliverance or success at the final moments; a WW1 armistice allusion). Their site and its general attitude seem warmer and more conciliatory than I would've expected from a company offering that service. And I just learned I'll be repaying far less than I had initially believed!I'm happy that Native Americans have this and gambling services to empower their people through karmically exploiting the folly and addictions of white people (of course, I expect them to cater to all races). That's not to say they're dishonest, or exploitative in an unethical way. I'm happy to have been bailed out, and happy to help enrich them through paying the high (but not unfair) fees which are inevitable and necessary for any such business. I'm sure I'll patronize their fine establishment again. Thanks, you guys!

name: Jamie
reviews: Spotloan  has helped  me  out a few times the option  to choose  how much I can  afford  to pay every 2 weeks  really  works  for me as a long  time customer  my apr was dropped  substantially  I  would  recommend  spotloan  to  anyone

reviews: Reviews must be fake, I have waited 24 hours and no deposit or information about my deposit. Yet I'm accruing interest on a deposit I have yet to receive. Don't waste your time, they do not follow through as stated on their website.** I've reached out to spotloan with no help on when the funds will come. Its just insane to wait all day until almost closing hours to hope they will deposit your funds.** I've receieved the same generic response from 3 to 4 call representatives and no urgency to get the problem solved. name: Brenda Dukes
reviews: I made a interest payment of 136.60 on  5/16/19 and on 5/20/19 I called to pay the loan off and they charged me another 136.60 interest  for four days I advise anyone going to do a loan like this go to Mobil loans they are cheaper and you get your money just as fast if not faster. When i ask how much my interest is a day he told me 9 dollars and some change so i should of only payed 4o dollars interest but instead they charged me 136.60. I will not be dealing with them any more and I hope that each of you  check before using them because they are a rip off. This was with Spotloan

name: Ron Cicogna
reviews: Common sense says don't get a payday loan because they are EXPENSIVE. I know this, but if you MUST go this way, then Spotloan is a great place to get temporary and quick financial assistance. I applied and was approved for $600 within minutes. My main source of income is once a month, so the loan was set up that way. You will receive an email within the first week regarding your payment schedule and if there are any changes you need to make it easier for you to repay. I got this email and realized the dates were not corresponding well with my payday. I also have a part-time gig where I get paid 2x per month. Spotloan worked with me to get my loan down to an affordable payment and 2x per month. They give you the loan and then contact you to make sure that everything works for you and will adjust payment amounts to make it affordable for you.

reviews: Aside from the ridiculously high interest rates, which is understood accompany all payday loans, paying early should be much easier than the existing process.  It's ridiculous that an early payment cannot be made online.  It's also absurd that there is a 2-day "processsing" time for early payments.  That's clearly in place to allow the interest to accrue for an additional 2 days.  The money is deposited within 1 business day but withdrawals take 2-3 days of "processing".  Overall, ridiculous repayment hoops are in place to clearly allow for accrual of more interest.

name: Gary Cockrum
reviews: Spotloan has provided loans for me, when I have needed cash and not wanted a payday loan. Overall my experience has been positive, but there have been some things that should be taken into consideration.Pros:Easy ApprovalFast FundingCons:Website does not detail things very well- i.e. you cannot login and review loan terms, make an extra payment, etc.After you pay off a loan, an email and the website tell you that you are "guaranteed" approval of a new loan. What is not said is that it must be at least 45 days from your last application. If you get a loan, but pay it off quickly, you will be told that you are guaranteed a new loan. Yet if you try to apply in the near future you get denied and are told you must wait 45 days from your last application. This is not addressed anywhere in the terms that can easily be found.Customer service reps are polite, but do not seem to have access to much of the information. "I cannot see the reasons for..." is a pretty common answer that was given when I asked questions.High APR....If you are in need of cash and do not want to pay 2000% APR on a payday loan, and would like a few months to pay, and can't get approved through a bank, then Spotloan is worth a try. Yes the APR is high, so if you borrow $600 and pay it back over 6 months, then you will pay over $2000 back. If you need money quickly and can pay it back in a few days, then Spotloan may be a good option.

name: Les
reviews: My review isn't an overall total 3 stars.  First, Spot Loan is one of the very few online loaners who were quick to act on my loan application and had it processed and approved in less than two hours.  That alone is worth a 5 star rating.  With such a fast approval, I was able to review and make changes in my monthly budget (where necessary) without the worry if I had the funds to meet my goals.The "why" for why I gave Spot Loan a lower rating than 5 was because of the ultra high interest rate on the loan. I don't begrudge a loan business in making a profit but not to excess.  If the interest rates were more reasonable, Spot Loan would have been given a 5+ star rating.   Overall, Spot Loan can be God send for anyone in quick need of cash (deposited in a checking account within 2 business days) as long as that person reviews the monthly payments amount over the entire course of the loan to identify a possible shortfall of needed money per month and make the necessary adjustments in the monthly budget.

reviews: The reason people come to get loans in desperate times, is because they are having hardships! But it is sad these people are being driven into more debt just for trying to get out. And $800 loan @$155 payback every 2 weeks x 21 payments = $3255.00 - $800.00 = @2455.00 in interest charge "ARE YOU KIDDING ME?" Well I am not! When I found my best friend was in dyer needs and went to this site, and is stuck paying this off, I was flabbergasted, I could have loaned her the money FREE of charge, I understand that many don't or may not have that type of friend, but don't get trapped in this scheme. They also are good with keeping in contact through email. My relationship specialist Stacy is great and sends me an email reminder for payment and they will push the payment back if you give them a few days notice. name: Jose Luis
reviews: I’ve had much better experience with Spotloan in the past, but THIS time they are the WORST! My loan was supposed to be due the third Wednesday of each month. They decided the third MONDAY was better for them. It was partly my fault for not verifying the dates with the calendar when they gave me the list of payment dates. But even so, when THEY decided a payment due on Monday, March 18 was okay to be snatched out of my account on SATURDAY, March 16 it put my account in an overdraft status that I hadn’t been in for YEARS! When I first called, the rep blamed it on the bank and said they deducted it early. THAT was a lie. I verified with my bank. They don’t do any withdrawals. The ACH FROM SPOTLOAN DID THE WITHDRAWAL TWO DAYS EARLY! When I called back to see if it could be reversed of course it couldn’t. And Alester, the rudest and most I knowledgeable rep in the history of reps said he couldn’t change my due dates to the third Wednesday. So I said then make it due the 21st of each month because that would be the latest the third Wednesday would fall in any month if the year. He said he couldn’t because it had to be weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly!Umm, doesn’t the 21st come EVERY MONTH? That falls under the category of MONTHLY! When he finally realized his stupidity, he said let me check and put me on hold. When he came back he decided that making my pay dates the 20th if each month would satisfy my request. I’m not even looking at a calendar but know for a FACT that TWICE a year the third Wednesday falls on the 21st. And after looking at a calendar, August is such a month! So he was just trying to f my account again! Smdh!!!I also asked about being reimbursed for the $34 my bank will charge me for the overdraft, he proceeded to rattle off very quickly an email address. All I understood was the word help and what sounded like “desk” or “disc.” Since desk was more reasonable asked him to repeat and even spelled it for him to see if that is what he said. It took him a while to tell me yes it’s help desk, but he NEVER CLARIFIED THE REST IF THE EMAIL ADDRESS!!!! If I couldn’t even understand the second word you said, what makes you think I heard or understood anything after!? So U get a partial email. Then I asked him to repeat his name. He spelled it soooo slowly like he was talking to a three year old just learning to write letters. Well dummy didn’t you think I was WRITING DOWN THE EMAIL AND YOU NEED TO SAY AND/OR SPELL WHAT YOU ARE SAYING CLEAR ENOUGH AND SLOW ENOUGH FOR A PERSON TO WRITE IT? So I tell him now give me the complete email address as slowly as you just gave your name. He didn’t understand! He again starts spelling his name!!!!! Then when he finally gives me the whole email address, he speaks so slowly he was being condescending. Learn how to give someone your name and the help desk email address!!! Learn how to read a calendar! Stop taking money out of people’s accounts before it’s authorized!

reviews: The first time I applied using the account I get paid with. It denied me because the "bank account wasn't eligible" even though it's direct deposit and works just fine. If my denial had NOTHING to do with my income and eligibility but only because of your inability to use American Express accounts, WHY do I have to wait 45 days to reapply? If I have to wait 45 days, I won't need your loan by then. It's a ridiculous policy for something that's supposed to compete with a payday loan... It makes your company pointless.Waste of time. I have no way of knowing what they are doing with my bank account information or if they are just a scam to collect info. Don't bother.

name: Acustomer Bob McA
reviews: applied for a loan on the 1/22/19 and was approved I emailed Betty V at spot loans on 1/23/19 asking about it and my account said I should of been sent a confirmation number which I did not receive. I received no return email from Betty V. I kept signing in to my account at spot loans everyday and it kept saying 24 to 48 hours for funds then changed to good news we are processing the payment. Today it is 1/28/19 and still no funds and online account still says processing and we will send you an email when completed. I called them and a guy answers and we verified all my info is true and correct including account number and routing number. He instructed me to call my bank and they said they do not reject deposits if correct numbers are on it and if they were wrong there is no record of that. I still so no change of status when I signed into my spotloans account and no email of deposit issues, no phone calls from this company and still no response email from BETTY VI called spot loans back and this time got and very rude lady who would not let me speak out my entire sentence with interrupting me like she had no patience or interest in my problem and this time told me I made the mistake with my bank account number. Now I have no way to see my loan documents and she would not give me access to review to verify if she was correct. Just told me to reapply again well geez guess what I stupidly applied again why I don't know and what happened bet you could guess  I WAS DENIED. can you say scam from the beginning if they were really interested in providing me this loan they would of been more willing to help me correct what ever problems I was having and provided me the loan, I mean really no phone call when the money was returned, no email and no change in status on my account when I logged in, very crappy customer service

name: Miranda Hannah
reviews: I had an issue applying with this company, I have 2 sources of really good income and I make way over $2000 a month in income but when I applied the first time I forgot to put in my company's name and phone number so there system spit me out and said I had no regular source of income, I called them to address this minor error and I was just advised to reapply. Which I did and got spit out again by there system saying I had to wait 45 days to reapply, but I needed this money now to help with a car payment with plans to use my tax refund to help pay this loan off. So I called again with this issue and the lady I got was very rude, tried to get me off the phone as quickly as possible and the position basically was we are done with you. VERY rude company, terrible customer service and offer no options for re evaluation of applications due to customer or system errors that have no wieght on a person's ability to repay a loan. TERRIBLE and I don't recommend this company to anyone.

name: YASMINDA CHAVES-SMITH
reviews: I have had a spotloan loan 5 times now, in the last 4 years so I was really all about them. Until yesterday, I had applied for a loan and got approved they said the money was being sent, I never got it. So I called, they said the money was sent back to them for my account I go being wrong, which I know was not correct because I checked my info. My license is FL, I live in FL, I used to live in Jersey, Maryland and also New York. They now all of a sudden want proof of where I live, why this time? I’ve literally paid them back every single time, and kept being a repeat customer but now all of a sudden you don’t believe where I live? Oh okay, cool well now you don’t have me as a customer at all and I will make sure everyone knows what kind of customer service you’re offering now. Also, the lady I spoke to kept saying she had to put me on hold and talk to her manager, then literally as I’m talking to her she puts me on hold while I’m talking, how rude!! So make sure if you use spotloan it’s in a state they service and that your info is all for that state because god forbid you move around for jobs, even though my license is still FL as it ALWAYS has been, for every loan I’ve had with them. I guess I don’t need to pay my bills. Thanks!

name: B. BROWN
reviews: Inept staff. Good luck trying to get ahold of anyone. And if you want to make an extra payment they make you wait 2 days so they can get getting the interest. They say no penalty for paying off early- that's a lie. If your account has a 125 dollar balance, your pay in full payment will be around 160. An extra 35 bucks? Sounds like a penalty to me. If you in a dire situation, I'd go with Rise or Ace. Lower interest rates and payments.
