reviews: Quickly Funded - what a joke!  I thought the purpose of these loans were they were quickly funded  not so.  I made request on Saturday and approved.   It is now the Wednesday afternoon before thanksgiving and I still do not have my funds.  I waited the two business day but still not there. I called and was told they would investigate and call back on Friday.  Then I got an email saying thank you for my inquiry and to allow 3-5 business days. On top of that— I then got a notice the the payment was coming due.  I wrote back saying I did not get funds and I am still awaiting a response Happy thanksgiving

They are not like the majority of fake online loan vendors who share and sell your personal information to anyone who will buy it and who often are trying to commit fraud and WILL sell it over and over again.

reviews: Two times....I took out a loan, and a payment was pulled twice on my first due date. I paid the loan off early with no additional issues.  I made the mistake of giving the company a second chance when I needed a short-term loan several months later for an unexpected expense.  The paydays were wrong, and I reached out to them immediately. Instead of correcting the matter, I was offered a more expensive restructure to change the dates to two weeks later. Again, this was 100% not my error. I would rather take a cash advance on my credit card than deal with this company again.

name: John Nesbit
reviews: I have had 3 loans with Spotloan and the first 2 were handled with efficiency and courtesy of the representatives I had contact with.  However, on a 3rd time for a loan of $300, I have had the unpleasant experience of having my payment returned by my bank, called and notified a rep that the deposit would not be available until 3 days later.  The rep was very nice and said they would put through the payment then.  Much to my surprise they ran it through that same day and my bank went ahead and paid it, causing me to be charged an overdraft of $30.  Then on the agreed date 3 days later, Spotloan ran another payment through which didn’t clear, causing another overdraft AND I was charged 2 $10 charges for a late payment!  Now I’m getting calls and emails every 45 minutes all day 7 days a week telling me I’m 40 days behind.  This despite one of their own collections mgrs sending me a text that my next payment is due November 14th after I have sent proof by my bank numerous times that I’m not due until 11/14.  The reps that call have not read any of the communication from me or their own account reps.  I refuse all calls from them now and the last text I sent told them when they learned to read their files then I would be happy to discuss my account with them on a recorded phone call because I want it documented exactly what is said by both parties.

name: Sunshine
reviews: Worst online loan experience I've had. First, there was an error in the application - the routing number and the account number were the same. Whoever processed the loan should have noticed this right away, since that is an OBVIOUS mistake. Additionally, I had a prior loan from them and they had been taking payments out of my account for several months, so they had the correct information on file. Then, when I emailed to follow up on the deposited funds two days later, I received an email saying the funds would be in my account by a certain date. The email did not state that it already was that date, so the funds were obviously not there, nor did anyone seem to doublecheck anything. Today, three days after my loan, I was told the funds were returned to Spotloan the day before I sent my email, and the loan was cancelled. My only option now is to submit another application, wait another 2 days for deposit, and hope they don't screw it up again. No one could help me, and no one seems to know what other people in the office are doing. I am beyond frustrated, but the last thing I want to do is put trust in Spotloan again since they have already cost me hundreds of dollars due to the delayed deposit.

reviews: The staff is very helpful. I just have a problem with the high interest rates that they charge. When someone decides to get a payday loan it's because they need the funds for an emergency. They should not have to be hit over the head with having to pay back triple of what they borrow. That only causes a bigger problem down the road for the borrower. But I guess that is the chance we take when dealing with loans. Because the company's main concern is making money, not actually helping people.

reviews: All of these bad credit loan places have ASTRONOMICAL interest rates.Pay them off ASAP and the rape pain doesn't linger as long.But they Quickly approved me.  Put money in account ASAP.  Was easy to contact by email.  Responded right away.  Customer Service and access was Excellent.Once again, these companies are what they are.  GO in with your Eyes Wide Open.  Know you're getting financially violated, but most likely, you're between a rock and a hard place and don't have any other viable alternative.  (Pay it off ASAP or you're borrowing $500 and paying back $1200.  Not good!)Good Luck!

name: Jeanell Leath
reviews: I made a mistake when I originally applied for my loan, I called right away to get it changed. I was told that I needed to wait and call back when the funds hit my bank. I did that and because I made a mistake, instead of my payments being $135 biweekly, they jumped up to over $150 biweekly.  I think that is poor customer service as I have been a customer in the past and paid off my loan without a problem.  I will never go through you again as I don't feel that was the right way to treat me, as I made a honest mistake and I am the one that had to pay for it.  It is frankly not right.
